00048 namespace {
00049   const char *usage[] = {
00050     "usage: Hypertable.Master [OPTIONS]",
00051     "",
00052     "OPTIONS:",
00053     "  --config=<file>   Read configuration from <file>.  The default config file is",
00054     "                    \"conf/hypertable.cfg\" relative to the toplevel install directory",
00055     "  --pidfile=<fname> Write the process ID to <fname> upon successful startup",
00056     "  --help            Display this help text and exit",
00057     "  --verbose,-v      Generate verbose output",
00058     ""
00059     "This program is the Hypertable master server.",
00060     (const char *)0
00061   };
00062   const int DEFAULT_PORT              = 38050;
00063   const int DEFAULT_WORKERS           = 20;
00064 
00065 
00069   class HandlerFactory : public ConnectionHandlerFactory {
00070   public:
00071     HandlerFactory(Comm *comm, ApplicationQueuePtr &app_queue, MasterPtr &master_ptr) : m_comm(comm), m_app_queue_ptr(app_queue), m_master_ptr(master_ptr) { return; }
00072     virtual void get_instance(DispatchHandlerPtr &dhp) {
00073       dhp = new ConnectionHandler(m_comm, m_app_queue_ptr, m_master_ptr);
00074     }
00075   private:
00076     Comm                *m_comm;
00077     ApplicationQueuePtr  m_app_queue_ptr;
00078     MasterPtr            m_master_ptr;
00079   };
00080 
00081 }

00087 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00088   string cfgfile = "";
00089   string pidfile = "";
00090   PropertiesPtr props_ptr;
00091   bool verbose = false;
00092   MasterPtr master_ptr;
00093   int port, reactor_count, worker_count;
00094   Comm *comm;
00095   ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue_ptr;
00096   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr;
00097   struct sockaddr_in listen_addr;
00098 
00099   System::initialize(System::locate_install_dir(argv[0]));
00100 
00101   if (argc > 1) {
00102     for (int i=1; i<argc; i++) {
00103       if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--config=", 9))
00104         cfgfile = &argv[i][9];
00105       else if (!strncmp(argv[i], "--pidfile=", 10))
00106         pidfile = &argv[i][10];
00107       else if (!strcmp(argv[i], "--verbose") || !strcmp(argv[i], "-v"))
00108         verbose = true;
00109       else
00110         Usage::dump_and_exit(usage);
00111     }
00112   }
00113 
00114   if (cfgfile == "")
00115     cfgfile = System::install_dir + "/conf/hypertable.cfg";
00116 
00117   props_ptr = new Properties(cfgfile);
00118 
00119   if (verbose)
00120     props_ptr->set("Hypertable.Verbose", "true");
00121 
00122   port         = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Port", DEFAULT_PORT);
00123   reactor_count = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Reactors", System::get_processor_count());
00124   worker_count  = props_ptr->get_int("Hypertable.Master.Workers", DEFAULT_WORKERS);
00125 
00126   ReactorFactory::initialize(reactor_count);
00127 
00128   comm = Comm::instance();
00129   conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager(comm);
00130 
00131   if (verbose) {
00132     cout << "CPU count = " << System::get_processor_count() << endl;
00133     cout << "Hypertable.Master.Port=" << port << endl;
00134     cout << "Hypertable.Master.Workers=" << worker_count << endl;
00135     cout << "Hypertable.Master.Reactors=" << reactor_count << endl;
00136   }
00137 
00138   app_queue_ptr = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00139   master_ptr = new Master(conn_mgr, props_ptr, app_queue_ptr);
00140 
00141   InetAddr::initialize(&listen_addr, INADDR_ANY, port);
00142   ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp(new HandlerFactory(comm, app_queue_ptr, master_ptr));
00143   comm->listen(listen_addr, chfp);
00144 
00145   if (pidfile != "") {
00146     fstream filestr (pidfile.c_str(), fstream::out);
00147     filestr << getpid() << endl;
00148     filestr.close();
00149   }
00150 
00151   master_ptr->join();
00152 
00153   return 0;
00154 }
